rotations.name: 1t_lb_rj_rg
rotations.description: Keeping all hots rolling on one target.

rotations.name: 2t_lb_rj_rg
rotations.description: Keeping lifebloom, rejuv and regrowth on two targets.

rotations.name: 3t_lb_rj
rotations.description: Keeping lifebloom and rejuv on three targets (if possible, otherwise prioritize lifeblooms then rejuv on tank1, then tank2 and finally tank3). If room for anymore gcd, use rejuv as filler.

rotations.name: 3t_lb_sq
rotations.description: Keeping lifebloom on three targets with spell queuing (whenever everything is active restart the loop even if the hots haven't faded).

rotations.name: 4t_lb_sq
rotations.description: Keeping lifebloom on four targets with spell queuing (whenever everything is active restart the loop even if the hots haven't faded).

rotations.name: 5t_lb_sq
rotations.description: Keeping lifebloom on five targets with spell queuing (whenever everything is active restart the loop even if the hots haven't faded).

rotations.name: rg_rank_10
rotations.description: Spamming regrowth (max rank) and leaving HoT fade on all targets (filler is regrowth).

rotations.name: rg_rank_8
rotations.description: Spamming regrowth (rank 8) and leaving HoT fade on all targets (filler is regrowth).
